verses.roman:
ei-mata jagadānanda śacīmātā-sane
caitanyera sukha-kathā kahe rātri-dine

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; jagadānanda—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; śacīmātā-sane—with mother Śacī; caitanyera—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sukha-kathā—words of happiness; kahe—says; rātri-dine—day and night.
translation: In this way, Jagadānanda Paṇḍita and mother Śacī talked day and night about the happiness of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
